sep_scene.content: In this image, we see a scene from the movie "The Godfather" featuring actor Robert De Niro. De Niro, dressed in a gray suit and tie, is standing at a table on a rooftop. He is holding a piece of paper in his hand and appears to be reading it. In the background, two men are seated at another table, engaged in conversation. The setting is a rooftop with a cityscape visible in the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene.

In this image, we see Leonardo DiCaprio, known for his role as Jay Gatsby in the movie The Great Gatsby. He is seated on a balcony, dressed in a black suit and tie, exuding an air of sophistication. His gaze is directed off to the side, and his expression is serious, hinting at the intensity of the scene. The backdrop of the image is a cityscape, with buildings and trees stretching out into the distance. The colors in the image are predominantly blue and green, adding to the urban setting.

In the image, a person is holding a folder with a picture of a man in it. The man in the picture is dressed in a suit and tie, and he is holding a pen in his hand. The folder is open, revealing the man's picture. The person holding the folder is wearing a black suit and tie, and they are holding the folder with their right hand. The background of the image is blurred, but it appears to be a wooden table. The image does not contain any text.

In this image, we see actor John Cusack, known for his role as a businessman in the movie "The Devil's Thieves". He is seated on a rooftop, dressed in a gray suit and tie, exuding an air of sophistication. His face is serious, reflecting the gravity of the situation. In the background, another man is seen, adding to the narrative of the scene. The cityscape unfolds behind them, with buildings and trees stretching out into the distance, painting a picture of urban life.

His attire is a sharp black suit, and his hair is styled in a loose, messy manner. His face carries a serious expression, hinting at the intensity of his character's situation. The backdrop is a cityscape, with buildings and trees scattered across the horizon, adding to the urban setting of the scene.

The overall mood of the image is one of reminiscence and concern, as if the subjects are lost in a memory that is cherished by the person holding the photo.
